title: 30 Scary Quotes That Will Definitely Keep You Up at Night
text:
When the sun goes down and the moon shines bright, it’s hard not to think about what’s out there in the darkness. With deep Celtic roots, Halloween has come to be known as the scariest night of the year, thanks to the belief that on October 31, the barrier between the living and the dead is at its weakest, allowing ghosts and spirits to return to Earth and walk among humans, again. Whether you give into this notion or not, it’s easy to wonder about it on Halloween night, when movies, songs, and even food all have themes of fear and death.

And if the holiday itself doesn't make you flinch, then these scary quotes will get under your skin. These sayings from books and films prove that if our worst fears don’t live within ourselves, they might just be surrounding us without our knowledge. Whether you’re looking for Halloween inspiration or you’re in the mood to be given a fright (with goosebumps included!), these scary quotes will do the trick. Prepare to feel shivers go down your spine that could keep you up all night.
